#summary Installing libs in linux.

== Installing jmf natives libs ==

cp jgve/resources/libs/jmf/libjm*.so $JAVA_HOME/jre/lib/i386/

*You must have write acesse to JAVA_HOME*


== Installing fobs4jmf natives libs ==

cp jgve/resources/libs/fobs4jmf/libfobs4jmf.so $JAVA_HOME/jre/lib/i386/

*You must have write acesse to JAVA_HOME*
